summary: ReVVamp is a very simple mod that modifies vampire progression so that feeding makes you stronger and hated while not feeding will make you weaker but much less scary.
descriptionHtml:
ReVVamp is a very simple mod that modifies vampire progression so that feeding makes you stronger and hated while not feeding will make you weaker but much less scary. 

Its a very small change to one script that has a pretty large impact on how you will play as a vampire. It also coincides a lot more with general vampire lore. Enjoy!

Dawnguard friendly too!
author: Russell TheCastle Meakim
